caption.p: Assessment of apoptosis and necrosis. (a) Cells exposed to A. malaccensis extract and observed adopting AO/EB staining. Control cells are viable and fluoresce uniformly in green; cells in apoptosis fluoresce from yellow to orange; necrotic cells are swollen and fluoresce in bright red. (b) Percentage of normal, apoptotic, and necrotic cells. Data are expressed as the average of three independent observations.
